column1: The Pit Room////With all the Yelp stars to review ratio
column2: I knew I was most likely in for a line. As our Lyft arrived
column4: but it wasn't too bad. The Houston humidity was surprisingly not too bad
column5: so our wait didn't seem awful at all. I'd never been
column6: but knew I wanted to try Houston BBQ since I know different parts of TX have different BBQs.
